resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Extensive experience working as a Validation/Quality Engineer in FDA regulated Medical Device, Bio Pharmaceutical, and Cosmetics with concentration in Process Validation, Equipment Validation,Cleaning Validation, and Materials Validation. Experience with commissioning, qualification and other validation activities in FDA regulated environment and research laboratories.
